short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move the search results from the left of the screen to the center of the screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will change the style of your google search results, best suited for larger screens/resolutions. On a 4k monitor you may notice the google search results are placed on the left of the screen leaving a lot of blank space on the right, this extension will move the text into the center of the screen, filling in that void.
